meanings.definition: To unfasten a buckle or seatbelt.
meanings.sent1: She quickly unbuckled her seatbelt before getting out of the car.
meanings.sent2: Remember to always unbuckle your seatbelt before exiting the vehicle.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous child unbuckled his seatbelt as soon as his mom turned her back.
meanings.sent4: With a swift motion, she unbuckled the old, rusty buckle on her bag.
meanings.sent5: The hiker unbuckled his backpack, feeling a sense of relief after a long journey.

meanings.sent1: The unbuckled backpack fell off his shoulders as he ran.
meanings.sent2: She noticed her unbuckled shoe and quickly fixed it before tripping.
meanings.sent3: The unbuckled helmet flew off his head during the rollercoaster ride.
meanings.sent4: The unbuckled belt on the rollercoaster added an extra thrill to the ride.
meanings.sent5: The unbuckled suitcase burst open, scattering clothes everywhere in the airport.
